description.jp: 狼に育てられて野山で生活していたがフリオニールと共に引き取られマリアの家庭で家族同然に育った青年。フィン国が襲撃されたことをきっかけに反乱軍に志願し 戦いに身を投じた。動物と意思疎通のできる特技を持つ穏やかで優しい 寡黙な巨漢。
description.gl: Initially raised by wolves in the wilderness, Guy was taken in by Maria's family along with Firion. The empire's attack on Fynn spurred the youths to join the rebellion, a cause to which Guy devoted himself. A gentle, quiet young man with an imposing build, he also possesses the ability to communicate with animals.

jp.text: 後ろも前も逃げられない！
おれ どうぶつのことば わかる
おまえ おいて いけない
あいつ 黒い仮面 守ってる！
レオンハルト いなかった

rank_up_desc.en: When using [Earth Smash (C)]\n• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV\n• Special effect +20%
rank_up_desc.gl: When using Earth Smash (C):\n • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%\n • Slight special effect boost after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「アーススマッシュ【C】」使用時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・使用後特殊効果の効果小アップ

name.gl: LDコールアビリティ_ガイ
name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_ガイ

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Gaia Swing (C)]
• Becomes 2-HIT AoE Earth melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
　+ 3-HIT AoE Earth melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
　+ 3-HIT AoE Earth melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking target's weakness
• Special effect's [DEF Up] +40%, [HP Damage Resist] + 20%
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Gaia Swing (C):
 • 4-hit group Earth  melee BRV  attack + group HP  attack delivered 2 times becomes 2-hit group Earth  melee BRV  attack + group HP  + 3-hit group Earth  melee BRV  attack + group HP  attack + 3-hit group Earth  melee BRV  attack + group HP  attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Moderately increases BRV damage dealt when attacking target's weakness
 • Boost to special effect after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ガイアスイング【C】」使用時
・4HIT土属性全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　2HIT土属性全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　＋3HIT土属性全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　＋3HIT土属性全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　に変化
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・弱点をついた時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
・使用後特殊効果の効果アップ

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
2-HIT AoE Earth melee BRV attack + ST HP attack
Recovers own HP by 40% of HP damage dealt (limit 15% of Max HP)
Excess HP recovered converted to BRV (limit 100% of INT BRV)
Self: 4 turns [Gaia's Protection]

While [Gaia's Protection] is active
• Restores party's BRV by 30% of Max BRV at end of turn
desc.gl:
2-hit group Earth melee BRV attack + single-target HP attack
Moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 15% of own MAX HP
HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
Self: 4 turns Gaia's Ward

While Gaia's Ward active:
 • Party: Increases BRV based on own MAX BRV at end of turn (does not stack)
desc.jp:
2HIT土属性全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃
与えたHPダメージに応じて自身のHP中回復
回復量の上限は 自身の最大HPの15％分
最大HPを超えてHPが回復した時
超えたHP分 自身のBRVに加算
自身に4ACTION「大地の守り」付与

desc.en:
When using [Gaia Rumble]
• Becomes 3-HIT AoE Earth melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered 3 times
• Increases total BRV potency by 310%
• Does not consume use count on next turn (excl. some abilities)

While [Gaia's Protection] is active
• [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [BRV Attack++]
　∟ 3-HIT Earth melee BRV attack + ST HP attack
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 30% compared to [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Recovers party's HP by 10% of Max HP
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] become [HP Attack++]
　∟ 2-HIT Earth melee BRV attack + ST HP attack
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 40% compared to [HP Attack+]
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Recovers party's HP by 10% of Max HP
desc.gl:
When using Gaia Rumble:
 • 2-hit group Earth melee BRV attack + group HP delivered 2 times becomes 3-hit group Earth melee BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Next turn after use does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)

While Gaia's Ward active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (3-hit Earth melee BRV attack; slightly restores party's HP)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (2-hit Earth melee BRV attack + HP ; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; slightly restores party's HP)
desc.jp:
「大地鳴動」使用時
・2HIT土属性全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　3HIT土属性全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を3回行う
　に変化し 合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・使用後 次の行動時 アビリティの使用回数を消費しない
